data_table.description: Sample ID, sample type [tumor or normal tissue], original material type, tumor type, % of melanoma cells in sample, and histopathology of samples obtained from participants with melanoma and involved in the "Melanoma Genome Sequencing Project" project.

variable.name: SAMPLE_TYPE
variable.description: Indicates the Tumor/Normal status of a sample

variable.name: Original Material Type
variable.description: Material from which analyte was extracted [Fresh Frozen Tissue; Cell Line, Viable; Whole Blood; Fresh Tissue; Whole Blood: PBMC]

variable.name: Tumor Type
variable.description: Indicates whether tumor sample represents a primary melanoma, recurrent melanoma or a metastases

variable.name: Sample Site
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: % Melanoma Cells
variable.description: Indicates purity of the sample used [Unknown]

variable.name: Comments on Histopathology
variable.description: Comments about the sample as entered by a pathologist
